SELECT , (select shop_name from shop s where s.shop_id=fpo.shop_id ) shopName from factory_production_order fpo where fpo.shop_id in (select su.shop_id from shop_user su where su.user_id=#{currentUserId}) and fpo.shop_id=#{shopId} and fpo.id=#{id} and fpo.status=#{status} and fpo.stock_record_id=#{stockRecordId}
and EXISTS (select 1 from factory_production_order_shop_sku fposs,shop_sku ss where fposs.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%') and fposs.factory_production_order_id=fpo.id)
and EXISTS (select 1 from factory_production_order_shop_sku fposs,shop_sku ss,sku where fposs.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.sku_id=sku.sku_id and sku.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%') and fposs.factory_production_order_id=fpo.id)
ORDER BY fpo.create_time desc

SELECT SUM(production_quantity) productionQuantity,ss.shop_parent_sku shopParentSku FROM factory_production_order_shop_sku fposs LEFT JOIN `shop_sku` ss ON fposs.`shop_sku_id`=ss.`shop_sku_id`
and fposs.factory_production_order_id=#{factoryProductionOrderId} and ss.shop_parent_sku like concat('%',#{shopParentSku},'%')
GROUP BY ss.shop_parent_sku ORDER BY ss.shop_parent_sku
SELECT DISTINCT colour FROM `shop_sku` ss,sku s WHERE ss.`shop_parent_sku`=#{shopParentSku} AND ss.`sku_id`=s.`sku_id` ORDER BY colour

SELECT SUM(fposs.`production_quantity`) productionQuantity,ss.`shop_parent_sku` shopParentSku,ss.shop_sku shopSku,ss.shop_sku_id shopSkuId,s.`colour`,s.size FROM `factory_production_order_shop_sku` fposs,`shop_sku` ss,sku s WHERE fposs.`factory_production_order_id`=#{factoryProductionOrderId} AND fposs.`shop_sku_id`=ss.`shop_sku_id` AND ss.`sku_id`=s.`sku_id` AND ss.`shop_parent_sku`=#{shopParentSku} GROUP BY s.`colour`,s.size order by s.`colour`
